TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit void extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Specifies a return value type for a method that does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Void structure is used in the <xref:System.Reflection?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, but is rarely useful in a typical application. The Void structure has no members other than the ones all types inherit from the <xref:System.Object> class.
